actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ape makes two Fist attacks. If both Fist attacks hit one Medium or smaller creature, the target is grappled (escape DC 13), and the ape can't grapple another creature.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 25/50 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage.
